title: Pair of Men's Leggings
description: blue wool with indigo stripes at top; red wool and beaded trim with rectangular red block of wool on each leg with geometric beaded strips; red wedge with beads above red blocks; blue beads at sides of legs and hem
creditline: Gift of funds from the N. Bud and Beverly Grossman Foundation in honor of Dr. Evan M. Maurer, Director Emeritus, for his visionary leadership of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1988-2005
